titleStmt.title: The king's right of indulgence in spiritual matters, with the equity thereof, asserted by a person of honour, and eminent minister of state lately deceased.
titleStmt.author: Anglesey, Arthur Annesley, Earl of, 1614-1686.
Care, Henry, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by Randall Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Arthur Anglesey. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
